special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The abjurer is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The abjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): blade ward. dancing lights, mending, message, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): blade ward. dancing lights, mending, message, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): alarm*, mage armor, magic missile, shield*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): alarm*, mage armor, magic missile, shield*

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell*, dispel magic*, fireball
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability*
descriptions.hyperlinked: 6th level (1 slot): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability*

special_abilities.name: Arcane Ward.
descriptions: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-l) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-l) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
